attachments.title: Leap Motion Launches VR Headset Mount For Its Hand-Tracking Controller
attachments.text: Today Leap Motion is launching a mount for its PC peripheral that lets you track your hands in virtual reality applications by attaching it to the front of the Oculus Rift or other headsets. This mount launches simultaneously with a new version of Leap Motion’s SDK that enables the device to keep track of your hands from headset’s perspective rather than below.
attachments.fallback: TechCrunch Link: Leap Motion Launches VR Headset Mount For Its Hand-Tracking Controller
